item.title: First Post - Creating a Website/Blog Using R
item.description: Obligatory First Post: How I made this blog Honestly, creating this website could not have been much easier. At this point, so many people have done posts on creating a personal site on github using blogdown and hugo that I don’t feel the need to explain in much detail. I followed a good walkthrough by Tyler Clavelle that you can find here: https://tclavelle.github.io/blog/blogdown_github/.
